c1.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
c1.descriptionRaw:
When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's <color=#FFD780FF>General's War Banner</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>General's Glory</color> deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's <color=#FFD780FF>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> is decreased by 2s.
This effect can occur once every 10s.
c1.description:
When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's Inuzaka All-Round Defense is decreased by 2s.
This effect can occur once every 10s.

c2.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
c2.descriptionRaw:
While <color=#FFD780FF>General's Glory</color> is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. 
This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.
c2.description:
While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. 
This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

c3.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Inuzaka All-Round Defense by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
c4.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>General's Glory</color> is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.
c4.description: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

c5.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Juuga: Forward Unto Victory by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
c6.descriptionRaw:
For 12s after using <color=#FFD780FF>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
· "Standing Firm": +10%
· "Impregnable": +20%
· "Crunch": +40%

This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.
